# Encoded Files

This folder contains Base64-encoded Lua files from The Forge script.

## Files
All `.b64` files in this directory are encoded versions of the original Lua scripts.

## How to generate these files

1. Run `encode_and_upload.py` from the root directory
2. Make sure you have set your GitHub Personal Access Token in the script
3. The script will automatically download, encode, and upload all files

## File Format
- Original: `filename.lua`
- Encoded: `filename.lua.b64`
- Encoding: Base64

---
*These files are automatically generated. Do not edit manually.*
